SELECT DISTINCT t3.ID_ AS id, t1.ID_ AS taskId, t1.NAME_ AS taskName, t1.START_TIME_ AS startTime, t3.CUSTOM_TASK_MAX_DAY_ AS customTaskMaxDay, t3.TASK_MAX_DAY_ AS taskMaxDay, t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS taskDefinitionKey, t1.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS processDefinitionId, t3.ASSIGNEE_ AS assignee, t6.DISPLAY_NAME_ as realName, IF ( t1.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL, 0, IF ( t3.SUSPENSION_STATE_ = 2 && t3.OVER_TIME = 2, TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, t3.SUSPENSION_TIME_, t3.END_TIME_ ), TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP (), t3.END_TIME_ ))) AS restTime, IF ( t1.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL, t1.END_TIME_, IF ( t3.SUSPENSION_STATE_ = 2 && t3.OVER_TIME = 2, date_add( t3.END_TIME_, INTERVAL TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, t3.SUSPENSION_TIME_, NOW()) SECOND ), t3.END_TIME_ )) AS endTime, t3.WORK_END_TIME_ as workEndTime, t3.SUSPENSION_TIME_ AS suspensionTime, CASE t3.SUSPENSION_STATE_ WHEN 1 THEN '激活' ELSE '挂起' END AS suspensionState, IF ( t1.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL, TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, t1.START_TIME_, t1.END_TIME_ ), IF ( t3.SUSPENSION_STATE_ = 1, TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, t1.START_TIME_, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ()), TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, t1.START_TIME_, t3.SUSPENSION_TIME_ ))) AS duration, t3.GROUP_ID_ as groupId, t1.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, t1.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t3.FLOW_TYPE_ AS flowType, CASE
WHEN t1.END_TIME_ IS NULL THEN '待办' ELSE '已办' END AS STATUS, CASE
WHEN t1.DELETE_REASON_ IS NULL THEN '审批' ELSE '驳回' END AS approveType, t4.NAME_ AS formName, t4.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS businessKey, t3.IS_DB_ AS isDb, t3.BUSINESS_INFO_ AS businessInfo, t5.MESSAGE_ as comment FROM act_hi_taskinst t1 LEFT JOIN act_ru_extension_task t3 ON T1.ID_ = t3.TASK_ID_ AND t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t3.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst t2 ON t3.PROC_INST_ID_ = t2.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst t4 ON T1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t4.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_comment t5 ON T1.ID_ = t5.TASK_ID_ and t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t5.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_id_user t6 ON t1.ASSIGNEE_ = t6.ID_ WHERE t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} and (t1.DELETE_REASON_ is null or t1.DELETE_REASON_ != 'MI_END')

FROM act_ru_extension_task t1 WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} and TASK_ID_ = #{taskId}
